alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 10:32PM CDT until August 13 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Central Logan County in central Oklahoma... Payne County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1032 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mulhall to 4 miles southeast of Guthrie, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Guthrie, Perkins, Langston, Carney, Glencoe, Tryon, Ripley, Agra, Coyle, Mulhall, Meridian, Lake Carl Blackwell, and Ingalls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
